name: The Turret at the End of Time
name_original: The Turret at the End of Time
description:
Global Game Jam San Diego 2022 - Team T.U.R.R.E.T

The Turret at the End of Time

Team Members

  • Sebastian
  • Ben
  • Tera
  • Ezra
  • Chris

The world ended long ago. The last buildings have tumbled into rubble. Magic has fallen in on itself, a self-consuming maelstrom of chaos. The remnants of the Ashen come to life, reveling in their freedom, short lived though it may be. They seek to pull the last dregs of the Masters into oblivion. But there is one last obstacle between them and victory. The Turret.

Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to Swap
